name: rexralbidv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))

stmt.origin: rexbidv(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Formula-building rule for restricted quantifiers (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2006.)
